lead_paragraph: Lionel Messi produced a vintage second-half performance to help  Barcelona to a 4-1 win over local rivals Espanyol on Sunday which saw the champions cut the gap on La Liga leaders Real Madrid to three points.

headline.print_headline: Barca Cut Deficit to Real Thanks to Magical Messi
headline.main: Barca Cut Deficit to Real Thanks to Magical Messi

snippet: Lionel Messi produced a vintage second-half performance to help  Barcelona to a 4-1 win over local rivals Espanyol on Sunday which saw the champions cut the gap on La Liga leaders Real Madrid to three points....
